description: Shifts the symbol along the vertical world axis by a given length. The length is set in screen space units.
title: verticalOffset

___minWorldLength.description: The minimum vertical symbol lift in world units. It acts as a lower bound to avoid lift becoming too small.

___screenLength.description: Maximal screen length of lift in points.

___maxWorldLength.description: The maximum vertical symbol lift in world units. It acts as an upper bound to avoid lift becoming too big.
